.
Who Cannot Be Paid the Special Allowance
The special allowance cannot be paid based on
entitlement to compensation under
38 U.S.C. 1151
, and
38 U.S.C. 1160
, or
Philippine service under
38 CFR 3.804(b)(2)
.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section A - Special Allowance Under 38 U.S.C. 1312(a)
